Different Crime.Crime Name: False or misleading information in citizenship application
residency_requirements: maintaining strong ties while temporarily absent
centralizing mode of existence in Canada
evidence_assessment: contradictions (missing stamps, tax year discrepancies, limited banking transactions)
decision_outcome: case remanded to a new citizenship judge for reassessment
standard_of_review: Appeal filed under subsection 14(5) of the Citizenship Act
misrepresentation_or_fraud: Contradictions and omissions in the applicants' documentation
